audioText: Nous partons en vacance en juillet pour visiter la côte française.
question: When are they going on vacation?
options: In June to visit the mountains
In July to visit the French coast
In August to visit the countryside
In September to visit the cities
explanation: The text states 'Nous partons en vacance en juillet pour visiter la côte française' - We are going on vacation in July to visit the French coast. The noun 'vacance' (vacation) indicates holiday time.
